message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement section, I can see a specific line item labeled "Beginning Balance" under the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section. This is exactly what we're looking for.

From the cash flow statement:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

This is confirmed by the balance sheet, where the initial amounts for "Cash on Hand" (3000000.00) and "Bank Deposits" (5000000.00) as of 2023-12-31 add up to 8000000.00.

Therefore, the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
